name: Stickman Skeet Shooting - The Clay Pigeon Hunt FREE
name_original: Stickman Skeet Shooting - The Clay Pigeon Hunt FREE
description:
From the creators of the hit apps Stickman Trampoline and Stickman High Diving!

Test your aim and your reaction time as you pick off discs with shotguns or an automatic rifle! Tap the discs to shoot them, pick off the Rocket discs to gain extra points, or the Angel disc to restore a life! Top GameCentre Leaderboards against shooters around the world, and beat out all the achievements to prove that you're the World's Greatest Skeet Shooter!

FEATURES INCLUDE:

* Easy to learn, hard to master!
* Choose from 3 awesome guns, with many more to come!
* Game Center Leaderboards
* Real-life shooting and explosion for an awesome gaming experience!
* Endless levels for hours of fun!

Join over 2.5 million people who have downloaded our games, and download Stickman Skeet Shooting NOW!

After all, who doesn't want an amazing FREE game?

Check out the PRO version for an Ad-Free experience with every feature unlocked and ready to go!
